SELECT info.`id`, info.`name`, info.`sex`, info.`intro`, info.`dept_id` AS deptId, dept.`name` AS deptName, info.`hospital_id` AS hospitalId, hospital.`name` AS hospitalName, info.`head_path` AS headPath, info.`pid_path` AS pidPath, info.`type`, dic.`name` AS careers, info.`status`, info.`territory`, info.`create_time` AS createTime FROM doc_doctor_info info LEFT JOIN doc_department_info dept ON info.`dept_id` = dept.`id` LEFT JOIN doc_doctor_hospital_info hospital ON info.`hospital_id` = hospital.id LEFT JOIN sys_dic_info dic ON info.`type` = dic.`id`
where info.status in (1,4)
and info.`name` like concat(concat('%',#{name}), '%')
and hospital.`name` like concat(concat('%',#{hospitalName}), '%')
and dept.`name` like concat(concat('%',#{deptName}), '%')
and info.doctor_type = 1
ORDER BY info.`status`ASC , info.`create_time` DESC
